_symbol_format: .TICKER YYMMDD P/C STRIKE  (positive qty = buy, negative = sell)
notes: SPY collar: long 100 shares + long 580P + short 620C, Apr expiry
rationale: Protect downside while capping upside, near zero-cost

entry_conditions.notes: Collar: own 100 shares + buy OTM put (protection) + sell OTM call (pays for put). Zero-cost or low-cost protection. Enter when you want to protect holdings but not pay for full insurance. Caps both upside and downside.

pnl_drivers.max_profit: Call strike - stock cost basis + net credit/debit from options
pnl_drivers.max_loss: Stock cost basis - put strike + net debit (if any)
pnl_drivers.primary_driver: Stock stays in range between put and call strikes
pnl_drivers.secondary_driver: Net theta often near zero (short call theta offsets long put theta)

greeks_profile.theta: near zero â€” short call decay offsets long put decay
greeks_profile.vega: near zero â€” short call vega offsets long put vega
greeks_profile.delta: positive but reduced (stock ~100, put ~-20, call ~-30 = ~50 net delta)
greeks_profile.gamma: mixed â€” long put positive gamma, short call negative gamma

pnl_drivers.ideal_scenario: Stock stays between put (580) and call (620) strikes. Both options expire worthless. Keep shares, protection was free.
